title: House for Sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
REF: HFS0105
Brand new luxury house with 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms offers a beautiful home with ultramodern architecture.

Three floors with balcony spaces, spacious living areas ,bedrooms and the house boasts an outside garden space with a unique architectural design .

It is being built to the highest environmental and technological standards, with top quality fittings.

3300 square-feet area
Fully A/C rooms and hot water facility to all parts of the house.

Fully equipped modern pantry
Separate maids room and washroom

Located conveniently with a short drive from Thalawathugoda junction , just about 45 minutes drive from Colombo and easy access to highway entrance.

Offered for sale off-plan, some of the key elements of the house are available as purchaser options that can be changed to suit their particular requirements.

These options will vary over time as progress on the Villa advances towards completion which is scheduled for May 2018.
